requirements.engineering: Engineering consulting requires 4 external companies with specific qualifications.

requirements.industrial: Industrial, agricultural, or service activities require 1 external company.
requirements.advertising: Advertising and promotions have no external company requirements.
requirements.noSpecialRules: No special external company requirements for this service type.

partnershipStructures.noLicenseNeeded: No investment license needed for Gulf nationals

businessActivity.title: Business Activity Requirements

businessActivity.oneCompanyRequirements: One company: CR + 10 years of documented experience

important.licenseRenewal: License renewal: Non-renewal stops bank account and residency services

important.sponsorPartnership: Sponsor partnership: Not recommended - obtain official investment license instead

requirements.engineering: Engineering consulting requires 4 external companies: 3 with CR + FS + 1 year operation, and 1 with CR + 10 years experience.
requirements.commercialSole: Commercial (sole partner) requires 3 external companies from 3 different countries.
requirements.commercialWithPartner: Commercial with a Saudi partner requires 1 external company (Saudi partner counts as two).
requirements.realEstate: Real estate development requires an external company and the first project value must be at least 300,000,000 SAR.
requirements.industrial: Industrial/agricultural/service activities require 1 external company with 1 year of operation and financial statements.
requirements.advertising: Advertising & promotions requires owning 50% share in an advertising company in your home country (renewed every 3 years).
requirements.noSpecialRules: No special external-company rules for the selected service.
